body_html: Problem solved after my server administrator purged all cuda/cudnn versions and reinstalled cuda-7.5/cudnn-v4. It's possible that some of the files got mixed up so that Tensorflow had difficulty locating consistent files.
body_text: Problem solved after my server administrator purged all cuda/cudnn versions and reinstalled cuda-7.5/cudnn-v4. It's possible that some of the files got mixed up so that Tensorflow had difficulty locating consistent files.
body: Problem solved after my server administrator purged all cuda/cudnn versions and reinstalled cuda-7.5/cudnn-v4. It's possible that some of the files got mixed up so that Tensorflow had difficulty locating consistent files.
